pinyin: Ji1 du1 jiao4 Min2 zhu3 Lian2 meng2
Ji1 du1 jiao4 Ke1 xue2 pai4

sentences.english: The two fish of Pisces show Christianity's split between spirit and matter.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼宫的两条鱼表明基督教的灵性与物质的分离。

sentences.english: Had Jesus not died on the cross, Christianity would not have triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣要是不死在十字架上，基督教就无法取得胜利。

sentences.english: Welcome to the Evangelical Formosan Church of Philadelphia resource link repository.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到费城台服基督教会网路资源链接库。

sentences.english: The score has also been published by the Chinese Christian Literture Council Ltd. , HK. , 2005. …
sentences.chinese: 乐谱亦已于2005年由香港基督教文艺出版社出版。

sentences.english: Can We Rely on Non-Christian Views of Justice?
sentences.chinese: 我们能依靠非基督教观的法官？

sentences.english: Christians celebrate the resurrection of Christ from the death.
sentences.chinese: 基督教徒们庆祝耶稣基督的复活。

sentences.english: This is the essence of Justin's apology.
sentences.chinese: 这是查士丁为基督教辩护的精华之所在。

sentences.english: On the other hand, Christian monotheism was an innovation.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，基督教一神论，是一种创新。

sentences.english: Christians preponderate in the population of that part of the country.
sentences.chinese: 基督教徒在该国的那一地区的人口中居多。

sentences.english: There is the unique Christian Audigier logo displayed on the dial.
sentences.chinese: 有独特的基督教奥迪吉耶在表盘上显示的标志。

sentences.english: But Gnosticism is opposed to an historicist view of Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 但是灵知主义反对对基督教持有一种历史主义的视角。

sentences.english: The school will train Muslim, Jewish and Christian clergy together.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校同时培训穆斯林，犹太教和基督教牧师。
但是像“基督教国家”这样的观念是很难消除的。

sentences.english: The Christian doctrine of creation finds its expression within the Church.
sentences.chinese: 而基督教的创世论教义是在教会内得到阐明的。

definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
